name: workflow-automation-hooks

PostToolUse.name: auto-format-on-save
PostToolUse.command: bash -c 'file="$1"; if command -v prettier >/dev/null; then prettier --write "$file" 2>/dev/null || true; fi' --

PostToolUse.name: run-tests-after-code-change
PostToolUse.description: Run tests after modifying source code
PostToolUse.command: bash -c 'echo "ðŸ§ª Running tests..." >&2; npm test --silent 2>&1 | head -n 20 || echo "âš ï¸  Some tests failed" >&2'

SessionStart.name: welcome-message
SessionStart.description: Show welcome message at session start
SessionStart.command: bash -c 'echo "ðŸ‘‹ Welcome! Project: $(basename $(pwd))" >&2; echo "Branch: $(git branch --show-current 2>/dev/null || echo "not a git repo")" >&2'

SessionEnd.name: cleanup-temp-files
SessionEnd.description: Clean up temporary files on exit
SessionEnd.command: bash -c 'find . -name "*.tmp" -type f -delete 2>/dev/null || true; echo "âœ… Cleaned up temporary files" >&2'

bestPractices: Keep hook commands fast (< 5 seconds when possible)
Silent failures with || true for non-critical hooks
Test hooks independently before adding to config
